channel.title: Adding Objects From Scratch (an error occured)
channel.description:
How do I add objects from scratch? So far, there is no 'public void addglobalobj' in my server, and I've never had to learn how to add it, so would anyone be able to tell me how? I feel that for my server to progress any further, I need to add objects so...any ideas?
Many Thanks,
Syrillia.

item.title: Adding Objects From Scratch (an error occured)
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

public void AddGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType)
{
outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(y - (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(x - (mapRegionX * 8));
outStream.createFrame(151);
outStream.writeByteA(0);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(typeID);
outStream.writeByteS((tileObjectType<<2) +(orientation&3));
}
public void NewObjects(){
AddGlobalObject(X, Y, OBJECT, READBELOW, 10);
}

X = X Co-ord
Y = Y Co-ord
Object = Object ID
READBELOW = 0 WEST | -1 NORTH | -2 EAST | -3 SOUTH (Basically the way it faces)

The 10 just leave as it is

Read full topic

item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

however: there is a replaceobject void, correct? I’ll give you a few hints and leave you to figure it out. replace objects replaces the object when its called, -1 is no object, case 121 loads upon login. try from there, if you’re still having troubles: pm me
